question: On the bus trip, Zoe and Ben saw cows in the fields. Skip count by 10s and tell how many cows they saw in total.
During the trip, they spotted trees growing along the road. Skip count by 10s and tell how many trees they saw.
In the fields, there were rows of colorful flowers. Skip count by 10s and tell how many flowers they saw.
As they passed the river, they saw groups of ducks swimming. Skip count by 10s and tell how many ducks they saw.
At one point, the bus passed a field with bales of hay. Skip count by 10s and tell how many bales of hay there were.
